snippet.title: SONIC LEGENDS - Panic City Zone Reveal + CGS Announcement
snippet.description:
Welcome to the heart of Metropolis Madness!

Hailing from 2006's Sonic Utopia, Panic City Zone acts as the halfway point to our journey!

It won't be long before you get to play it, as we're bringing you a BRAND NEW demo to the Chao Games Showcase on November 1̶5̶t̶h̶!̶ 22nd!


Follow us on Twitter and be sure to join our community Discord server to get the latest information on the project! 
https://twitter.com/SonicLegends20
https://discord.gg/3S8wZb2peG
